 Home

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Poppins|||on|||||” header_font_size=”24px” header_letter_spacing=”0.5px” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”left” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Services

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ specialty=”on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466″ module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” bottom_divider_color=”gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466″ bottom_divider_flip=”horizontal” border_color_bottom=”#dbdbdb” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466%22:%91%22bottom_divider_color%22%93}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ specialty_columns=”2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_row_inner _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Headline” module_class=”sub-page-first-h2″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”27px” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_3_font=”||||||||” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”||20px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-67607d58-508f-41bc-a380-cac561f01151%22:%91%22header_text_color%22,%22header_text_color%22%93}”]

Affordable Tax Relief Services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#1C50A4″ divider_weight=”6px” _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”16%” custom_margin=”||15px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Big Text” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|500|||||||” text_text_color=”#040011″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620%22:%91%22text_text_color%22,%22text_text_color%22,%22text_text_color%22,%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

Our tax professionals have resolved tax issues for thousands of clients. Optima has the experience to resolve almost any IRS problem. You will receive personalized tax relief solutions crafted to fit your unique tax problems. A few of the major tax relief services we provide include:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text ul_type=”none” module_class=”otr-bullet-list-1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620″ link_font=”||||||||” link_text_color=”#494949″ ul_font=”||||||||” ul_text_color=”gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620″ ul_font_size=”16px” ul_line_height=”2em” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||-45px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620%22:%91%22ul_text_color%22,%22text_text_color%22%93}” link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” link_text_color__hover=”#0C71C3″ sticky_enabled=”0″ custom_css_main_element=”li a {|| border-bottom: dashed;||||}”]

  • Free Tax Consultation
  • Tax Liability Investigation & Resolution Proposal
  • Tax Preparation & Compliance
  • Tax Settlement & Tax Negotiation

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_video src=”https://youtu.be/e1OiHtCPNpY” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_video][et_pb_code admin_label=”Schema Code” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-5a100212-1cec-4a0c-a7e8-f296dae24415″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-5a100212-1cec-4a0c-a7e8-f296dae24415%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”Tax Relief Investigation” _builder_version=”4.23.4″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]Immediately upon calling Optima you will speak with a qualified Tax Associate who will assess your best options. This tax relief consultation is 100% free and confidential.

Next, you can take your first step towards resolving your tax problem – the Investigation Phase. First, our tax professionals perform an extensive investigation into the specifics of your case. Armed with the details, they will identify the best possible tax resolution strategy.

Sometimes the IRS will use wage garnishments, bank levies or tax liens to threaten taxpayers. Our agents can take immediate action, negotiating with the IRS, and working to help stop these aggressive tactics during the Investigation.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”Tax Resolution” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Optima’s tax attorneys have the experience to secure you the best possible deal from the IRS. You can rest assured that your case will get the expert attention that it deserves. Our team consists of over 25 licensed expert tax relief service professionals – on-staff and in-house.

  1. First, our agents gather and file all the necessary documents to bring you into full legal compliance with the IRS.
  2. Next, our tax relief experts meticulously build a case to support your resolution strategy.
  3. Finally, they present your case to the IRS and position you to receive the best attainable financial outcome.
    Every tax problem is unique, but our goal is always the same: to provide you with the best financial outcome allowed by law.

Your tax relief professional will keep you informed and empowered throughout the entire process. Our passion and dedication to customer service is at the heart of our Core Values.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}” background_color=”gcid-388bea5e-1853-420f-bb0c-1bf7cb437466″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”What is Tax Relief?” _builder_version=”4.23.4″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ title_text_align=”center” title_text_align_tablet=”center” title_text_align_phone=”left” title_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.23.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”16px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Tax relief refers to various strategies and programs designed to help individuals or businesses reduce their tax liabilities, settle back taxes, or negotiate more manageable payment terms with the IRS. At Optima Tax Relief, clients benefit from a range of personalized services such as Offer in Compromise, installment agreements, and penalty abatement, which are aimed at alleviating the financial burden caused by tax debt. These solutions help taxpayers navigate complex IRS processes while ensuring compliance and reducing stress.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”Affordable Tax Relief Services” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ title_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ title_text_align_tablet=”center” title_text_align_phone=”left” title_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_heading][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”16px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color=”#0C71C3″ sticky_enabled=”0″ custom_css_main_element=”p {padding-bottom: 25px;}||h3{padding-bottom: 5px;}”]

Offer in Compromise (OIC)

To qualify for an OIC you must have an inability to repay your taxes owed within the time the IRS has to collect.

Penalty Abatement

The IRS may assess a variety of penalties on your tax account including late filing and late payment fees. Sometimes the penalties dwarf the actual taxes owed.

Installment Agreement

This payment plan agreement allows you to pay your full total taxes owed in equal, yet smaller and more manageable amounts.

Partial Pay Installment Agreement (PPIA)

A payment agreement whereby the total number of payments made to the IRS is less than the total amount of tax due, when full payment cannot be completed prior to the expiration of the statute of limitations.

Tax Lien Discharge

You relinquish your rights and allow any property with an IRS lien to be sold free and clear of the tax lien.

Tax Lien Subordination

Allows a “junior” creditor to move ahead of the IRS for claim on the property.

Tax Lien Withdrawal

Your tax liability is satisfied, and the lien is released.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”16px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” link_text_color=”#0C71C3″ sticky_enabled=”0″ custom_css_main_element=”p {padding-bottom: 25px;}||h3{padding-bottom: 5px;}”]

Wage Garnishment Release

Your liability is satisfied, and the garnishment is lifted.

Bank Levy Release

You paid your tax liability, or the time limit expired, releasing the levy.

Innocent Spouse Relief

You filed a joint return, the tax due is understated, you didn’t know, so it is unfair to hold you liable.

Currently Non-Collectible

Assigned by the IRS when someone cannot pay due to a temporary hardship.

Statute of Limitations

The time limitation (generally 10 years) on which the IRS can collect taxes and levies. The start time varies for each action taken.

Collection Appeal

The Office of Appeals is separate from and independent of the IRS Collection Office. Check here for your collection appeal rights.

Administrative Appeal

You may file an administrative appeal with the IRS under four circumstances. For complete information, check under IRS 8.7.14.4.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”12172″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”TrustPilot Carousel” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Trustpilot

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(234,234,234,0.5)” custom_margin=”70px|auto|60px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px|30px|true|false” border_color_all=”#1C50A4″ border_width_left=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”center” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”15px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px|20px||20px|false|true” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”10px|40px|10px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
